Name: df.shape
Description: Gives the shape rows x columns

Name: df.info()
Description: Gives a bit more info than shape , primarily about data type of different columns

Name: pd.set_option()
Description: Lets you change various settings , for example maximum columns shown

Name: df.head(int i)
Description: by default head shows 5 , but if you pass a number , it will show you that much but from the beginning
